original: @1b #// rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @1b #// rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: sarba dharma mah'a sinti bo dhi tsatti ku la ya r'a dza /
analyzed: sarba dharma mah'a sinti bo dhi tsatti ku la ya r'a dza /
translated: Sarva-dharma-mahāsanti-bodhicitta-kulayarāja

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po /
analyzed: chos thams cad rdzogs pa chen po byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po /
translated: The All-Creating King, the Mind of Perfect Enlightenment of the Great Perfection of All Phenomena

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, the All-Creating King of the Mind of Perfect Enlightenment.

original: 'di skad bshad pa'i dus na /
analyzed: 'di skad bshad pa'i dus na /
translated: When this was explained,

original: 'og min gyi gnas /🔽chos nyid kyi mkha'/
analyzed: 'og min gyi gnas / chos nyid kyi mkha'/
translated: in the Akaniṣṭha realm,🔽the space of reality,

original: dbyings nyid kyi klong /
analyzed: dbyings nyid kyi klong /
translated: the expanse of the ultimate expanse,

original: sems nyid kyi gnas /
analyzed: sems nyid kyi gnas /
translated: the abode of the mind itself,

original: ye shes @2a #//
analyzed: ye shes @2a #//
translated: the wisdom

original: sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i gzhal yas khang na nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / nyid kyi ngo bo dang / nyid kyi thugs rje ye shes mngon du phyung ba'i 'khor /
analyzed: sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i gzhal yas khang na nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / nyid kyi ngo bo dang / nyid kyi thugs rje ye shes mngon du phyung ba'i 'khor /
translated: in the immeasurable palace free from obscurations, the retinue that manifests the wisdom of its own nature, its own essence, and its own compassion.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi 'khor chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sa zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku chu zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /
analyzed: nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi 'khor chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sa zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku chu zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /
translated: the retinue of the essence of the sambhogakāya water,🔽the retinue of the essence of the sambhogakāya fire,🔽the retinue of the essence of the sambhogakāya air,

original: nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku me zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rlung zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / nyid kyi ngo bo'i @2b 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku nam mkha' zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang /🔽gzhan yang thugs rje ye shes mngon du phyung ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor /
analyzed: nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku me zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / nyid kyi ngo bo'i 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rlung zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / nyid kyi ngo bo'i @2b 'khor longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku nam mkha' zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / gzhan yang thugs rje ye shes mngon du phyung ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor /
translated: and the retinue of the essence of the sambhogakāya space.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: Furthermore, there is the retinue of the nirmāṇakāya that manifests compassion and pristine consciousness.

original: 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi sems can zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi sems can zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / gzhan yang /🔽nyid kyi rang bzhin la lta ba'i 'khor rnam pa bzhi /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi sems can zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi sems can zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / gzhan yang / nyid kyi rang bzhin la lta ba'i 'khor rnam pa bzhi / 'di lta ste /
translated: the retinue called the sentient beings of the desire realm, the retinue called the sentient beings of the form realm, the retinue called the sentient beings of the formless realm, and🔽further, the four kinds of retinue who view one’s own nature.🔽🔽

original: shin tu rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / yongs su rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / sems dpa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / nyid kyi ngo bo dang /🔽nyid kyi thugs rje rang bzhin 'byed pa mi mnga' @3a *//🔽bas thabs gcig go /🔽gzhan yang / nyid kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i 'khor /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: shin tu rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / yongs su rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / sems dpa'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i 'khor dang / nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / nyid kyi ngo bo dang /🔽nyid kyi thugs rje rang bzhin 'byed pa mi mnga' @3a *//🔽bas thabs gcig go /🔽gzhan yang / nyid kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i 'khor /🔽'di lta ste /
translated: The retinue called the sentient beings of the desire realm, the retinue called the sentient beings of the form realm, the retinue called the sentient beings of the formless realm, and so on.

original: sngar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas nyid la gnas pa'i 'khor dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis don mdzad pa'i 'khor dang / slad nas byon pa'i sangs rgyas nyid las 'byung ba'i 'khor dang / 'byed pa mi mnga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis thabs gcig par bzhugs so //
analyzed: sngar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas nyid la gnas pa'i 'khor dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyis don mdzad pa'i 'khor dang / slad nas byon pa'i sangs rgyas nyid las 'byung ba'i 'khor dang / 'byed pa mi mnga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis thabs gcig par bzhugs so //
translated: The retinue that abides in the buddhahood of the past, the retinue that benefits beings through the buddhahood of the present, the retinue that will arise from the buddhahood of the future, and the retinue that abides in the single method of the nature that is not differentiated.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des 'khor thams cad nyid kyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir 'khor thams cad nyid kyi sems nyid kyi thugs la thim par mdzad do //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des 'khor thams cad nyid kyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir 'khor thams cad nyid kyi sems nyid kyi thugs la thim par mdzad do //
translated: Then, in order to bless the entire retinue as the nature of himself, the all-creating king of bodhicitta caused the entire retinue to dissolve into his mind, his own mind.

original: rang 'byung gi ye shes gsal bar mdzad do //
analyzed: rang 'byung gi ye shes gsal bar mdzad do //
translated: He illuminated self-originated pristine consciousness.

original: de nas thams cad chos nyid du ldan par bya ba'i phyir thams cad bsdus nas thig le chen po gcig bzhugs so //
analyzed: de nas thams cad chos nyid du ldan par bya ba'i phyir thams cad bsdus nas thig le chen po gcig bzhugs so //
translated: Then, in order to unite all into dharmatā, he gathered everything into a single great bindu.

original: de nas sems @3b dpa' de nyid kyi rang bzhin thig le chen po gcig tu bzhugs pa de las byung nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i spyan sngar dga' ba'i sems kyis dang ba'i mdangs phyung ste 'khod pas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos
analyzed: de nas sems @3b dpa' de nyid kyi rang bzhin thig le chen po gcig tu bzhugs pa de las byung nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i spyan sngar dga' ba'i sems kyis dang ba'i mdangs phyung ste 'khod pas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos
translated: Having arisen from that, in the presence of the all-creating mind of enlightenment, the bodhisattva was delighted and sat there with a radiant complexion.

original: sems dpa' rdo rje la smras pa /
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rje la smras pa /
translated: The all-creating mind of enlightenment said to the bodhisattva:

original: sems dpa' rdo rje ae ma ho //
analyzed: sems dpa' rdo rje ae ma ho //
translated: “Oh, bodhisattva vajra!🔽Oh, the mind of delight has arisen!

original: dga' ba'i sems skyes ae ma ho; ;dang ba'i mdangs phyung ae ma ho //
analyzed: dga' ba'i sems skyes ae ma ho; ;dang ba'i mdangs phyung ae ma ho //
translated: Oh, the radiant complexion has been revealed!

original: nga las byung ba ae ma ho //🔽zhes gsungs pas /
analyzed: nga las byung ba ae ma ho // zhes gsungs pas /
translated: Oh, the one who has arisen from me!”

original: de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa /
analyzed: de nas sems dpa' rdo rjes zhus pa /
translated: Then the bodhisattva vajra made a request:🔽“Kye!

original: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
analyzed: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
translated: All-creating king, teacher of teachers,

original: ston pa nyid kyang thig le spros med dam //
analyzed: ston pa nyid kyang thig le spros med dam //
translated: is the teacher also a bindu free of proliferation?

original: 'khor rnams kun kyang thig le spros med dam //
analyzed: 'khor rnams kun kyang thig le spros med dam //
translated: Are all the retinues also bindus free of proliferation?

original: bstan pa kun kyang thig le spros med dam //
analyzed: bstan pa kun kyang thig le spros med dam //
translated: Are all the teachings also bindus free of proliferation?

original: dus dang gnas kyang thig le spros med dam //
analyzed: dus dang gnas kyang thig le spros med dam //
translated: Are time and place also bindus free of proliferation?

original: thams cad kun kyang thig le'i rang bzhin na //
analyzed: thams cad kun kyang thig le'i rang bzhin na //
translated: Since everything is by nature the essence,

original: ston pa'i ston pas ci zhig ston par mdzad //
analyzed: ston pa'i ston pas ci zhig ston par mdzad //
translated: what is the teacher teaching?

original: 'khor du 'khor ba'i don ni ci la 'khor //
analyzed: 'khor du 'khor ba'i don ni ci la 'khor //
translated: What is the meaning of the retinue circling?

original: 'khor la bstan pa ci zhig ston par byed //
analyzed: 'khor la bstan pa ci zhig ston par byed //
translated: What is taught to the retinue?

original: dus dang gnas ni gcig pa ji lta bu //🔽zhes zhus so //
analyzed: dus dang gnas ni gcig pa ji lta bu // zhes zhus so //
translated: What is the single time and place?

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des sems dpa' rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so //
translated: Then the teacher of teachers, the all-creating mind itself, the King, said this to the bodhisattva Vajra:

original: kye sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po /
translated: Oh, great being!

original: yid sgra la chug cig /
analyzed: yid sgra la chug cig /
translated: Let your mind be immersed in sound.

original: nges don sgrar bshad kyi /
analyzed: nges don sgrar bshad kyi /
translated: I will explain the definitive meaning in sound.

original: kye sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po /
translated: Oh, great being!

original: @4a *// sems nyid kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ni //
analyzed: @4a *// sems nyid kun byed rgyal po nga nyid ni //
translated: I, the all-creating mind itself, the King,

original: chos rnams thams cad kun gyi snying po ste //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad kun gyi snying po ste //
translated: am the essence of all phenomena.

original: snying po ma spros ye nas thig le yin //
analyzed: snying po ma spros ye nas thig le yin //
translated: The unelaborated essence is primordially the essence.

original: thig le ye nas spros pa med pa'i don //
analyzed: thig le ye nas spros pa med pa'i don //
translated: The meaning of the primordially unelaborated essence

original: ston pa dang ni bstan pa 'khor dus gnas //
analyzed: ston pa dang ni bstan pa 'khor dus gnas //
translated: is the teacher, the teaching, the retinue, the time, and the place.

original: nga las byung bas ye nas thig le ste //
analyzed: nga las byung bas ye nas thig le ste //
translated: Since they arise from me, they are primordially the essence.

original: nga yi rang bzhin thig le bstan pa yin //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin thig le bstan pa yin //
translated: I have revealed the nature of my essence, the bindu.

original: zhes gsungs so //🔽byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: zhes gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
analyzed: gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
translated: This completes the first chapter of the all-creating monarch, mind of enlightenment, the chapter on the introduction.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad nyid las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba la gnas par mdzad do //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des chos thams cad nyid las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba la gnas par mdzad do //
translated: Then the all-creating monarch, mind of enlightenment, remained in the samadhi called “the source of all phenomena.”

original: de nas 'khor gyi rang bzhin las sems dpa' rdo rje langs nas ston pa byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i zhal du mdangs phyung ste 'khod nas zhus pa /
analyzed: de nas 'khor gyi rang bzhin las sems dpa' rdo rje langs nas ston pa byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i zhal du mdangs phyung ste 'khod nas zhus pa /
translated: Then from the nature of the retinue, the bodhisattva Vajra arose and, gazing with admiration at the face of the teacher, the all-creating monarch, mind of enlightenment, he sat there and asked:🔽“Kye!

original: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
analyzed: kye; ston pa'i ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
translated: All-creating monarch, teacher of teachers,

original: khyod kyi 'khor du bdag 'dus 'khod pa de //
analyzed: khyod kyi 'khor du bdag 'dus 'khod pa de //
translated: we have gathered here as your retinue.

original: bdag ni 'tshal ba'i don ni ci zhig mchis //
analyzed: bdag ni 'tshal ba'i don ni ci zhig mchis //
translated: What is the purpose of our being here?

original: bdag 'tshal don ni khyod kyis bstan du gsol //
analyzed: bdag 'tshal don ni khyod kyis bstan du gsol //
translated: Please teach us the purpose of our being here.”

original: zhes zhus so //
analyzed: zhes zhus so //
translated: Thus he asked.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / nyid kyi ngo bo dang / nyid kyi thugs rje las chos thams @4b cad bkod pa ni nyid kyi rang 'byung gi ye shes chen po gcig las rang 'byung gi ye shes chen po lnga byung ba ni /
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des nyid kyi rang bzhin dang / nyid kyi ngo bo dang / nyid kyi thugs rje las chos thams @4b cad bkod pa ni nyid kyi rang 'byung gi ye shes chen po gcig las rang 'byung gi ye shes chen po lnga byung ba ni /
translated: Then, the all-creating king, bodhicitta, having arranged all phenomena from its own nature, its own essence, and its own compassion, the five great self-originated pristine consciousnesses arose from the single great self-originated pristine consciousness.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: zhe sdang rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang / 'dod chags rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang // gti mug rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang // phrag dog rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang // nga rgyal rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang //
analyzed: zhe sdang rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang / 'dod chags rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang // gti mug rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang // phrag dog rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang // nga rgyal rang 'byung ye shes chen po dang //
translated: the great self-originated pristine consciousness of anger, the great self-originated pristine consciousness of desire, the great self-originated pristine consciousness of ignorance, the great self-originated pristine consciousness of jealousy, and the great self-originated pristine consciousness of pride.

original: rang 'byung gi ye shes lnga po zhes rgyan gyi rgyu chen po lnga ni phyung /
analyzed: rang 'byung gi ye shes lnga po zhes rgyan gyi rgyu chen po lnga ni phyung /
translated: The five great self-originated pristine consciousnesses are the five great causes of the ornaments.

original: 'jig cing brten pa'i khams chen po gsum ni bkod de rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus lnga gcig tu blangs pa /
analyzed: 'jig cing brten pa'i khams chen po gsum ni bkod de rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus lnga gcig tu blangs pa /
translated: The three great realms of destruction and support are arranged as the ornaments. The five bodies of the cause of the ornaments are taken as one.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus sa zhes bya ba'i lus dang / rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus chu zhes bya ba'i lus dang / rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus me zhes bya ba'i lus dang / rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus rlung zhes bya ba'i lus dang / rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus nam mkha' zhes bya ba'i lus la gcig tu lus thams cad blangs /
analyzed: rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus sa zhes bya ba'i lus dang / rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus chu zhes bya ba'i lus dang / rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus me zhes bya ba'i lus dang / rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus rlung zhes bya ba'i lus dang / rgyan gyi rgyu'i lus nam mkha' zhes bya ba'i lus la gcig tu lus thams cad blangs /
translated: The body of the cause of the ornament called the earth body, the body of the cause of the ornament called the water body, the body of the cause of the ornament called the fire body, the body of the cause of the ornament called the air body, and the body of the cause of the ornament called the space body are included in the single body.

original: ye shes lnga'i rigs so sor phye ste rang 'byung ye shes zhe sdang gi rigs dang / rang 'byung ye shes 'dod chags kyi rigs dang / rang 'byung ye shes gti mug gi rigs dang / rang 'byung ye shes phrag dog gi rigs dang / rang 'byung ye shes nga rgyal gyi rigs dang /
analyzed: ye shes lnga'i rigs so sor phye ste rang 'byung ye shes zhe sdang gi rigs dang / rang 'byung ye shes 'dod chags kyi rigs dang / rang 'byung ye shes gti mug gi rigs dang / rang 'byung ye shes phrag dog gi rigs dang / rang 'byung ye shes nga rgyal gyi rigs dang /
translated: The five kinds of pristine consciousnesses are individually distinguished, and the family of the self-originated pristine consciousness of anger, the family of the self-originated pristine consciousness of desire, the family of the self-originated pristine consciousness of ignorance, the family of the self-originated pristine consciousness of jealousy, and the family of the self-originated pristine consciousness of pride

original: rang @5a *// 'byung ye shes lnga'i rigs lus rgyan gyi lus can gyi chos nyid bkod do //
analyzed: rang @5a *// 'byung ye shes lnga'i rigs lus rgyan gyi lus can gyi chos nyid bkod do //
translated: are the arrangement of the dharmatā of the body that has the body of the ornament of the five families of self-originated pristine consciousness.

original: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po de nyid kyang nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi chos nyid bkod pa de bzhin du bzhugs so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po de nyid kyang nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi chos nyid bkod pa de bzhin du bzhugs so //
translated: The all-creating monarch, awakened mind, abides just like that, in the array of its nature, the nature of phenomena.

original: de nas sems dpa' rdo rje de byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i spyan sngar yang 'dug nas /
analyzed: de nas sems dpa' rdo rje de byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po'i spyan sngar yang 'dug nas /
translated: Then Bodhisattva Vajra sat before the all-creating monarch, awakened mind, and made this request:🔽“Kye!

original: kye / ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
analyzed: kye / ston pa kun byed rgyal po lags //
translated: Teacher, all-creating monarch,

original: nyid kyi thugs gcig rang 'byung ye shes las //
analyzed: nyid kyi thugs gcig rang 'byung ye shes las //
translated: from your one mind—naturally occurring timeless awareness—🔽five aspects of naturally occurring timeless awareness come into being,

original: rang 'byung ye shes rnam pa lnga byung nas; ;de las rgyan gyi rgyu lnga byung nas ni //
analyzed: rang 'byung ye shes rnam pa lnga byung nas; ;de las rgyan gyi rgyu lnga byung nas ni //
translated: and from them come the five adornments, the causes.

original: ye shes lnga yi lus lnga blangs pa 'dis //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi lus lnga blangs pa 'dis //
translated: With these five bodies of the five aspects of timeless awareness,

original: kun byed rgyal po'i dgos pa ci zhig che //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po'i dgos pa ci zhig che //
translated: what great purpose is served by the all-creating monarch?”

original: zhes zhus so //
analyzed: zhes zhus so //
translated: This was his request.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des slar gsungs pa /
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po des slar gsungs pa /
translated: Then the all-creating monarch, awakened mind, replied:🔽“Kye!

original: kye / sems dpa' chen po dgos pa ni //
analyzed: kye / sems dpa' chen po dgos pa ni //
translated: Great being, the purpose is this:

original: kun byed rgyal po byed mkhan nga las ni //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po byed mkhan nga las ni //
translated: apart from me, the all-creating monarch, the creator,

original: ma gtogs pa yi byed mkhan gzhan na med //
analyzed: ma gtogs pa yi byed mkhan gzhan na med //
translated: there is no other creator.

original: chos nyid byed pa yang ni nga las med //
analyzed: chos nyid byed pa yang ni nga las med //
translated: And the activity of dharmatā is none other than me.

original: ston pa gsum yang 'god pa nga las med //
analyzed: ston pa gsum yang 'god pa nga las med //
translated: The three teachers are none other than me.🔽The assembly of retinues is none other than me.

original: 'khor gyi tshogs kyang 'god pa nga las med; ;de bzhin chos nyid 'god pa nga las med //🔽sems dpa' rdo rje khyod la nga yis ni //
analyzed: 'khor gyi tshogs kyang 'god pa nga las med; ;de bzhin chos nyid 'god pa nga las med // sems dpa' rdo rje khyod la nga yis ni //
translated: Likewise, the arrangement of dharmatā is none other than me.

original: nga yi rang bzhin khyod la bstan par bya //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin khyod la bstan par bya //

translated: The specific appearances of the six kinds of beings

original: 'di ltar snang ba nga yis khyed la bstan pa yin //
analyzed: 'di ltar snang ba nga yis khyed la bstan pa yin //
translated: Are what I have shown you.

original: sku gsum theg pa rnam pa drug bstan pa //
analyzed: sku gsum theg pa rnam pa drug bstan pa //
translated: The three kāyas are explained in the six kinds of spiritual approaches,

original: nga yis bstan na khyed kyis ma mthong ste //
analyzed: nga yis bstan na khyed kyis ma mthong ste //
translated: But even though I have shown them to you, you do not see them.

original: de re nga yi ngo bo re re ste //
analyzed: de re nga yi ngo bo re re ste //
translated: Each of them is my essence,🔽Each with its own kāya, speech, and mind,

original: sku re dang ni gsung re thugs re dang // kun gyis mthong ba'i ngo bo re re 'o //
analyzed: sku re dang ni gsung re thugs re dang // kun gyis mthong ba'i ngo bo re re 'o //
translated: And each with its own essence that is seen by all.

original: de yang nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa yin //
analyzed: de yang nga yi rang bzhin bstan pa yin //
translated: That, too, is the nature of me, Samantabhadra, being shown.

original: yang dag kun gyi ngo bo byang chub ngas //
analyzed: yang dag kun gyi ngo bo byang chub ngas //
translated: The essence of all that is authentic is enlightenment.

original: spros med dbyings kyi ngo bo nga yin la //
analyzed: spros med dbyings kyi ngo bo nga yin la //
translated: I am the essence of the basic space of simplicity,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas chen nga yin pas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas chen nga yin pas //
translated: And I am the great abode of all buddhas.

original: rol pa khams gsum rgyud drug nga las shar //
analyzed: rol pa khams gsum rgyud drug nga las shar //
translated: The display arises from me in the six classes of beings in the three realms.

original: bde dang sdug bsngal las kyi khyad par te //
analyzed: bde dang sdug bsngal las kyi khyad par te //
translated: Happiness and suffering are due to specific karma.

original: yang dag ma nor nga yi thugs rje bstan //
analyzed: yang dag ma nor nga yi thugs rje bstan //
translated: I reveal authentic compassion, unerring.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa can rnams la //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa can rnams la //
translated: Those who follow spiritual approaches based on either causes or results

original: kun byed nga yi lung 'di bstan mi bya //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi lung 'di bstan mi bya //
translated: Should not be taught this transmission of me, the all-creating one.

original: nga yi lung 'di nges par bstan byas na //
analyzed: nga yi lung 'di nges par bstan byas na //
translated: If I teach this transmission definitively,

original: dge sdig las la rgyu 'bras yod zer nas //
analyzed: dge sdig las la rgyu 'bras yod zer nas //
translated: saying that there are causes and effects of virtuous and negative actions,

original: yang dag nga la sgro dang skur btab pas //
analyzed: yang dag nga la sgro dang skur btab pas //
translated: they will slander and denigrate me, the truth.

original: yang dag nga dang yun du phrad mi 'gyur //
analyzed: yang dag nga dang yun du phrad mi 'gyur //
translated: Therefore, they will not meet with me, the truth, for a long time.

original: nga ni ston pa kun byed byang chub sems //
analyzed: nga ni ston pa kun byed byang chub sems //
translated: I am the teacher, bodhicitta, the all-creating one.

original: byang chub sems ni kun byed rgyal po ste //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni kun byed rgyal po ste //
translated: Bodhicitta is the all-creating monarch.

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas byang chub sems kyis byas //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas byang chub sems kyis byas //
translated: The buddhas of the three times are created by bodhicitta.

original: khams gsum sems can byang chub sems kyis byas //
analyzed: khams gsum sems can byang chub sems kyis byas //
translated: Sentient beings of the three realms are created by bodhicitta.

original: snang srid snod bcud byang chub sems kyis byas //
analyzed: snang srid snod bcud byang chub sems kyis byas //
translated: The world of appearances and possibilities is created by bodhicitta.

original: rgyu 'bras dpe don gtan tshigs mthun par byas //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras dpe don gtan tshigs mthun par byas //
translated: Causes, results, examples, meanings, and reasons are created in harmony.

original: rgyu yi dus na @11a *//
analyzed: rgyu yi dus na @11a *//
translated: At the time of the cause,

original: 'byung chen lnga byas la //
analyzed: 'byung chen lnga byas la //
translated: the five great elements are created.

original: 'bras bu'i dus na khams gsum sems can byas //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i dus na khams gsum sems can byas //
translated: At the time of the result, sentient beings of the three realms are created.

original: dpe yi dus na kun dpe nam mkha' byed //
analyzed: dpe yi dus na kun dpe nam mkha' byed //
translated: At the time of the example, space is the example for everything.🔽At the time of the meaning, nonarising is the meaning of everything.

original: don gyi dus na kun don skye med byed; ;rtags kyi dus na kun byed byang chub sems //
analyzed: don gyi dus na kun don skye med byed; ;rtags kyi dus na kun byed byang chub sems //
translated: At the time of the sign, bodhicitta is the creator of everything.

original: gtan tshigs dus na rang 'byung ye shes ston //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dus na rang 'byung ye shes ston //
translated: The reason is that it reveals self-originated timeless awareness.

original: rgyu 'bras dpe don gtan tshigs mthun par byas //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras dpe don gtan tshigs mthun par byas //
translated: The causal, symbolic, and logical factors are brought into harmony.

original: byang chub sems kyis kun byas gcig ma byas //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyis kun byas gcig ma byas //
translated: Everything is created by awakened mind, but nothing is created.

original: kun byas byang chub nyid kyi rang bzhin byas //
analyzed: kun byas byang chub nyid kyi rang bzhin byas //
translated: Everything created is created as the nature of awakened mind itself.

original: gcig ma byas pa nyid la bya mi dgos //
analyzed: gcig ma byas pa nyid la bya mi dgos //
translated: Nothing is created, so there is no need to create anything.

original: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin ma btags par //
analyzed: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin ma btags par //
translated: Without my being labeled as the nature of all-creating me,

original: nga yis byas pa'i chos la nges brtags pas //
analyzed: nga yis byas pa'i chos la nges brtags pas //
translated: things created by me are ascertained by me.

original: brkam zhing chags pa'i dbang gis snang ba 'grub //
analyzed: brkam zhing chags pa'i dbang gis snang ba 'grub //
translated: Through the power of craving and attachment, things are accomplished,

original: mi rtag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'jig par 'gyur //
analyzed: mi rtag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin 'jig par 'gyur //
translated: but they are impermanent and illusory by nature and so will disintegrate.

original: cha med dmus long lta bu'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: cha med dmus long lta bu'i rang bzhin no //
translated: They are like a blind person with no sense of proportion.

original: kun byed rgyal pos byas par mi cha bar //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal pos byas par mi cha bar //
translated: The all-creating monarch is not involved in creation.

original: dbang po drug la yul drug snang ba la //
analyzed: dbang po drug la yul drug snang ba la //
translated: In the appearance of the six sense objects to the six sense powers,

original: sdug bsngal mthong nas dbang po 'gegs par byed //
analyzed: sdug bsngal mthong nas dbang po 'gegs par byed //
translated: suffering is seen and the sense powers are blocked.

original: des ni kun byed byas pa mi cha bas //
analyzed: des ni kun byed byas pa mi cha bas //
translated: The all-creating one is not involved in that creation.

original: skye 'gag med pa'i 'bras bu de la med //
analyzed: skye 'gag med pa'i 'bras bu de la med //
translated: That fruition, which is unborn and unceasing, is not in that.

original: nges pa cig la bden pa gnyis byung nas //
analyzed: nges pa cig la bden pa gnyis byung nas //
translated: When the two levels of truth arise in the definitive one,

original: kun byed nga yis byas pa'i chos nyid la //🔽don dam kun rdzob bden pa gnyis byung bas //
analyzed: kun byed nga yis byas pa'i chos nyid la // don dam kun rdzob bden pa gnyis byung bas //
translated: In the nature of phenomena, created by me, the all-creating one,🔽the two levels of truth—the ultimate and the relative—occur.

original: bden pa gnyis kyi rgyu 'bras yod mi mnga'//
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi rgyu 'bras yod mi mnga'//
translated: But in these two levels of truth, there is no causality, either existent or nonexistent.

original: rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i 'bras bu de la med //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras 'das pa'i 'bras bu de la med //
translated: In that fruition, which transcends causality, there is no existence.🔽And in the samadhi of purity, which is sought in the absence of existence,

original: med par tshol ba dag pa'i ting 'dzin dang // mi 'byung cho 'phrul yan lag sgom mnga' bas //
analyzed: med par tshol ba dag pa'i ting 'dzin dang // mi 'byung cho 'phrul yan lag sgom mnga' bas //
translated: and in the branch of miraculous display, which does not occur,

original: blang dor med @11b pa'i 'bras bu thob pa med //
analyzed: blang dor med @11b pa'i 'bras bu thob pa med //
translated: there is no attainment of a fruition that is beyond acceptance and rejection.

original: don gcig ting 'dzin rnam gsum sgom byed pas //
analyzed: don gcig ting 'dzin rnam gsum sgom byed pas //
translated: By cultivating the three aspects of meditative absorption in the single meaning,

original: bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhir rim par bsgom byed pas //
analyzed: bsnyen bsgrub rnam bzhir rim par bsgom byed pas //
translated: and by cultivating the four aspects of approach and accomplishment in stages,

original: rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i 'bras bu de la med //
analyzed: rtsol sgrub 'das pa'i 'bras bu de la med //
translated: there is no fruition in that which transcends effort and achievement.

original: lhun gyis grub pas bya byed kun dang bral //
analyzed: lhun gyis grub pas bya byed kun dang bral //
translated: Spontaneously present, one is free of all that is done and all that is made.

original: skye med mtshon med gdags med de brjod pas //
analyzed: skye med mtshon med gdags med de brjod pas //
translated: Since it is unborn, cannot be characterized, and cannot be labeled,

original: sgro skur bral ba'i brjod med de rig byed //
analyzed: sgro skur bral ba'i brjod med de rig byed //
translated: it is to be known as inexpressible, beyond exaggeration and denigration.

original: chos kun byang chub sems yin de dpe ni //
analyzed: chos kun byang chub sems yin de dpe ni //
translated: The awakened mind of all phenomena is illustrated by the following analogies:

original: kun dpe nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin du //
analyzed: kun dpe nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin du //
translated: The all-inclusive analogy is that of space.

original: byang chub sems kyi don yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi don yang de bzhin no //
translated: The meaning of awakened mind is the same.

original: nam mkha' rlung chu sa me snang ba lnga //
analyzed: nam mkha' rlung chu sa me snang ba lnga //
translated: Space, air, water, earth, and fire—these five elements

original: byang chub sems las rmad byung mngon sangs rgyas //
analyzed: byang chub sems las rmad byung mngon sangs rgyas //
translated: Are wondrously manifest as awakened mind.

original: srid gsum snyam  lnga 'gro drug snang ba yang //
analyzed: srid gsum snyam  lnga 'gro drug snang ba yang //
translated: The three states of conditioned existence, the five classes of living beings, and the six kinds of beings—all that manifests

original: rnam smin las kyis mi bskyod mngon sangs rgyas //
analyzed: rnam smin las kyis mi bskyod mngon sangs rgyas //
translated: Is manifest as awakened mind, unwavering due to the ripening of karmic action.

original: khams gsum ye nas byang chub sku gsung thugs //
analyzed: khams gsum ye nas byang chub sku gsung thugs //
translated: The three realms are timelessly awakened mind, awakened body, speech, and mind.

original: de bas snang srid snod bcud thams cad kun //
analyzed: de bas snang srid snod bcud thams cad kun //
translated: Therefore, all that exists—the entire universe of appearances and possibilities🔽—

original: nam mkha'i ngang na mi gnas med pa bzhin //
analyzed: nam mkha'i ngang na mi gnas med pa bzhin //
translated: Is like space, which has no existence as anything, yet is not nonexistent.

original: byang chub sems kyi klong chen yul che bas //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi klong chen yul che bas //
translated: The vast expanse of awakened mind is the vast domain

original: sangs rgyas sems can snod bcud kun kyang gnas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sems can snod bcud kun kyang gnas //
translated: In which buddhas, ordinary beings, and the entire universe are present.

original: thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid la //
analyzed: thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid la //
translated: Within the nature of phenomena, completely pure,

original: gnyis su med de sgros skur kun dang bral //
analyzed: gnyis su med de sgros skur kun dang bral //
translated: There is no duality, and everything is free of value judgments and labels.

original: gang gis med pa'i snying po sems ma mthong //
analyzed: gang gis med pa'i snying po sems ma mthong //
translated: Those who do not see the nonreferential heart essence

original: bskal pa du mar don dang phrad mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bskal pa du mar don dang phrad mi 'gyur //
translated: Will not encounter the ultimate meaning for many eons.

original: chos kun rtsa ba byang chub sems su gcig /
analyzed: chos kun rtsa ba byang chub sems su gcig /
translated: The root of all phenomena is the oneness of awakened mind.

original: sangs rgyas sems can snang srid snod bcud kun //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sems can snang srid snod bcud kun //
translated: All buddhas, sentient beings, the world and its inhabitants,

original: thams cad 'byung ba'i byang chub snying po la //
analyzed: thams cad 'byung ba'i byang chub snying po la //
translated: The essence of awakening, from which everything arises,

original: gcig tu med las bgrangs na brjod mi lang //
analyzed: gcig tu med las bgrangs na brjod mi lang //
translated: Is not one, and if enumerated, is inexpressible.

original: sangs rgyas sku gsung sems can lus dag kyang //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sku gsung sems can lus dag kyang //
translated: The buddha bodies, speech, and the pure bodies of sentient beings

original: byang @12a *// chub sems yin ye nas gzung 'dzin bral //
analyzed: byang @12a *// chub sems yin ye nas gzung 'dzin bral //
translated: Are awakened mind, timelessly free of dualistic perception.

original: gzung 'dzin bral ba gang gis grub pa de //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin bral ba gang gis grub pa de //
translated: Whoever is free of dualistic perception

original: des ni kun grub chos kyi rtsa ba grub //
analyzed: des ni kun grub chos kyi rtsa ba grub //
translated: Has accomplished everything and established the root of phenomena.🔽The single root of awakened mind

original: byang chub sems kyi mdo rtsa gcig pu la; ;sems shing rtog la dga' bas rnam par bgrangs //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi mdo rtsa gcig pu la; ;sems shing rtog la dga' bas rnam par bgrangs //
translated: Is explored and enumerated with delight by those who contemplate and imagine it.

original: gnyis dang grangs la dga' la nga yis bstan //
analyzed: gnyis dang grangs la dga' la nga yis bstan //
translated: I have revealed it to those who delight in the enumeration of two.

original: ji bzhin rang bzhin chos nyid sems gcig la //
analyzed: ji bzhin rang bzhin chos nyid sems gcig la //
translated: The nature of a single mind, just as it is, is the nature of phenomena.

original: sems la rang bzhin rnam pa gsung snang bas //🔽rang bzhin gsum ni bkod pa'i mchog gsum ste //
analyzed: sems la rang bzhin rnam pa gsung snang bas // rang bzhin gsum ni bkod pa'i mchog gsum ste //
translated: The nature of mind manifests as the three aspects of speech.🔽These three natures are the three supreme arrays,

original: de ni phun sum tshogs pa'i chos nyid do //
analyzed: de ni phun sum tshogs pa'i chos nyid do //
translated: The nature of phenomena, perfect in every way.

original: gnyis med gcig gi rang bzhin kun 'brel bas //
analyzed: gnyis med gcig gi rang bzhin kun 'brel bas //
translated: The nature of the single nonduality is connected with everything.

original: rnal ma gcig la 'byor pa rnam pa bzhi //
analyzed: rnal ma gcig la 'byor pa rnam pa bzhi //
translated: The four kinds of mastery are present in a single state of naturalness.

original: rnal 'byor rnam pa bzhi yi yul du bstan //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnam pa bzhi yi yul du bstan //
translated: These are revealed to be the domain of the four kinds of yoga.

original: sems nyid gcig la che ba lngar bstan pa //
analyzed: sems nyid gcig la che ba lngar bstan pa //
translated: The five great aspects are shown to be present in a single mind.

original: sems kyi rang bzhin yon tan lnga ldan pas //
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin yon tan lnga ldan pas //
translated: Since the nature of mind is endowed with five qualities,

original: rang bzhin lnga la che lngar ming du btags //
analyzed: rang bzhin lnga la che lngar ming du btags //
translated: the five aspects of its nature are termed “the five great ones.”

original: nges pa gcig la yin min sgros byung bas //
analyzed: nges pa gcig la yin min sgros byung bas //
translated: In a single state of certainty, the question of whether or not this is so arises.

original: gol sgrib the tshom rtog pa bsam yas ni //
analyzed: gol sgrib the tshom rtog pa bsam yas ni //
translated: The countless concepts of error, obscuration, and doubt

original: kun byed rtsol sgrub rtog 'das sel bar byed //
analyzed: kun byed rtsol sgrub rtog 'das sel bar byed //
translated: are eliminated by the allcreating one, who is beyond imagination, effort, or achievement.

original: yod med sgros skur the tshom bsal ba'i phyir //🔽de bzhin nyid kyi byang chub mi rtog pas //
analyzed: yod med sgros skur the tshom bsal ba'i phyir // de bzhin nyid kyi byang chub mi rtog pas //
translated: In order to clear away doubt about the implications of the question of whether or not the allcreating one exists,

original: ma nor nges pa'i lung de gtan la 'bebs //
analyzed: ma nor nges pa'i lung de gtan la 'bebs //
translated: the implications of the question of whether or not the allcreating one exists are resolved.

original: de nyid yid ches mngon du bstan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de nyid yid ches mngon du bstan pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to reveal the certainty of that very fact,

original: la dor yid ches pa yi lung bcu yis //
analyzed: la dor yid ches pa yi lung bcu yis //
translated: the ten transmissions of conviction concerning the transcendence of effort and achievement are revealed.

original: rtsol sgrub bya med don bstan de yid ches //
analyzed: rtsol sgrub bya med don bstan de yid ches //
translated: In order to reveal the truth of the absence of anything needing to be done,

original: med par bden pa'i tshig dgu smras pa ni //
analyzed: med par bden pa'i tshig dgu smras pa ni //
translated: the nine statements about the truth of ineffability are made.

original: snying po gcig la mthong ba'i yul dgu byung //
analyzed: snying po gcig la mthong ba'i yul dgu byung //
translated: In the single heart essence, nine objects of perception occur.

original: rang res mthong ba'i bden pa'i tshig @12b dgu smras //
analyzed: rang res mthong ba'i bden pa'i tshig @12b dgu smras //
translated: I have spoken the nine words of truth that you have seen.

original: kun byed nga la thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: kun byed nga la thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir //
translated: Because everything is perfect in me, the all-creating one,

original: byang chub sems kyi don 'di che bar gyis //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi don 'di che bar gyis //
translated: You should understand that the meaning of awakened mind is supreme.

original: chos kun rtsa ba kun byed byang chub sems //
analyzed: chos kun rtsa ba kun byed byang chub sems //
translated: Awakened mind, the creator of everything, is the root of all phenomena.

original: ji ltar snang ba nga yi ngo bo yin //
analyzed: ji ltar snang ba nga yi ngo bo yin //
translated: Whatever appears is my essence.

original: ji ltar byung ba nga yi cho 'phrul yin //
analyzed: ji ltar byung ba nga yi cho 'phrul yin //
translated: Whatever arises is my magical display.

original: sgra tshig ji ltar byung ba thams cad kun //
analyzed: sgra tshig ji ltar byung ba thams cad kun //
translated: All sounds and words, however they occur,

original: nga yi don nyid tshig sgrar phyung ba yin //
analyzed: nga yi don nyid tshig sgrar phyung ba yin //
translated: are my very meaning expressed in words and sounds.🔽The buddhas’ kāyas, timeless awareness, and qualities,

original: sangs rgyas sku dang ye shes yon tan dang // sems can lus dang bag chags la sogs pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sku dang ye shes yon tan dang // sems can lus dang bag chags la sogs pa //
translated: and the bodies and habitual patterns of ordinary beings,

original: snang srid snod bcud bsdus pa thams cad kun //
analyzed: snang srid snod bcud bsdus pa thams cad kun //
translated: all that is contained within the world of appearances and possibilities,

original: byang chub sems kyi ngo bo ye nas yin //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi ngo bo ye nas yin //
translated: is timelessly the essence of awakened mind.

original: sems las ma gtogs pa yi chos rnams ni //
analyzed: sems las ma gtogs pa yi chos rnams ni //
translated: Apart from mind, there are no phenomena.

original: nga las byung ba'i sangs rgyas lngar 'das la; ;kun byed rgyal po nga yis lung ma bstan //
analyzed: nga las byung ba'i sangs rgyas lngar 'das la; ;kun byed rgyal po nga yis lung ma bstan //
translated: The buddhas of the past arose from me, the all-creating one, yet I, the all-creating monarch, have not proclaimed their existence.

original: da ltar bzhugs dang slad kyis byon pa la //
analyzed: da ltar bzhugs dang slad kyis byon pa la //
translated: The buddhas of the present and those to come

original: kun byed rgyal po byang chub lung mi ston //
analyzed: kun byed rgyal po byang chub lung mi ston //
translated: The All-Creating King does not predict enlightenment.

original: zhes gsungs so //🔽byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
analyzed: zhes gsungs so // byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal po las /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: rtsa ba gcig pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
analyzed: rtsa ba gcig pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
translated: This completes the sixth chapter of the All-Creating Sovereign, the mind of enlightenment, the chapter on the single root.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyis byas pa las byung ba'i chos rnam par dbye ba 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems kun byed rgyal pos nyid kyis byas pa las byung ba'i chos rnam par dbye ba 'di gsungs so //
translated: Then the all-creating king, mind of enlightenment, spoke these words on the analysis of phenomena that arise from what is created by itself:🔽Kye!

original: kye sems dpa' chen po /
analyzed: kye sems dpa' chen po /
translated: Great being!

original: sems ni ji bzhin pa yi ngo bo ste //
analyzed: sems ni ji bzhin pa yi ngo bo ste //
translated: Mind is the essence of just what is.

original: ji bzhin gnyis med bde ba chen po la //
analyzed: ji bzhin gnyis med bde ba chen po la //
translated: Just what is, nondual and supremely blissful,

original: rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa yongs kyis med //
analyzed: rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa yongs kyis med //
translated: is endowed with all aspects and utterly without aspects.🔽Primordially abiding like space, free of elaboration,

original: spros bral nam mkha' bzhin du ye gnas la; ;dmigs pa'i yul 'das gcig ces bgrang du med //
analyzed: spros bral nam mkha' bzhin du ye gnas la; ;dmigs pa'i yul 'das gcig ces bgrang du med //

analyzed: gzung 'dzin gnyis kyang gol sa sgrib par bshad //

translated: O courageous one, do not conceptualize the vajra mind!

original: nga ni ye nas kun byed byang chub sems //
analyzed: nga ni ye nas kun byed byang chub sems //
translated: I am forever the all-creating mind of awakening.

original: nga yis byas pa kun kyang byang chub sems //
analyzed: nga yis byas pa kun kyang byang chub sems //
translated: Everything created by me is also the awakened mind.

original: nga yi rang bzhin ye nas rnam dag byang //
analyzed: nga yi rang bzhin ye nas rnam dag byang //
translated: My nature is forever pure and awakened.
